title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
descr: Rig derrick equipment and operate pumps to circulate mud or fluid through drill hole.
alt_titles: Derrick Hand, Derrick Man, Derrick Operator, Derrick Worker, Driller, Drilling Motorman, Floor Hand, Fracturing Derrick Operator, Gas Derrick Operator, Oil Derrick Operator, Rotary Derrick Operator, Well Service Derrick Worker
experience: Little or no previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is needed for these occupations. For example, a person can become a waiter or waitress even if he/she has never worked before.
education: Some of these occupations may require a high school diploma or GED certificate.
job_training: Employees in these occupations need anywhere from a few days to a few months of training. Usually, an experienced worker could show you how to do the job.
example: These occupations involve following instructions and helping others. Examples include food preparation workers, dishwashers, floor sanders and finishers, landscaping and groundskeeping workers, logging equipment operators, and baristas.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Control the viscosity and weight of the drilling fluid.
work_tasks.descr: Control the viscosity and weight of the drilling fluid.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Repair pumps, mud tanks, and related equipment.
work_tasks.descr: Repair pumps, mud tanks, and related equipment.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Set and bolt crown blocks to posts at tops of derricks.
work_tasks.descr: Set and bolt crown blocks to posts at tops of derricks.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Listen to mud pumps and check regularly for vibration and other problems to ensure that rig pumps and drilling mud systems are working properly.
work_tasks.descr: Listen to mud pumps and check regularly for vibration and other problems to ensure that rig pumps and drilling mud systems are working properly.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Inspect derricks, or order their inspection, prior to being raised or lowered.
work_tasks.descr: Inspect derricks, or order their inspection, prior to being raised or lowered.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Inspect derricks for flaws, and clean and oil derricks to maintain proper working conditions.
work_tasks.descr: Inspect derricks for flaws, and clean and oil derricks to maintain proper working conditions.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Start pumps that circulate mud through drill pipes and boreholes to cool drill bits and flush out drill cuttings.
work_tasks.descr: Start pumps that circulate mud through drill pipes and boreholes to cool drill bits and flush out drill cuttings.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Position and align derrick elements, using harnesses and platform climbing devices.
work_tasks.descr: Position and align derrick elements, using harnesses and platform climbing devices.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Guide lengths of pipe into and out of elevators.
work_tasks.descr: Guide lengths of pipe into and out of elevators.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Prepare mud reports, and instruct crews about the handling of any chemical additives.
work_tasks.descr: Prepare mud reports, and instruct crews about the handling of any chemical additives.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Supervise crew members, and provide assistance in training them.
work_tasks.descr: Supervise crew members, and provide assistance in training them.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Clamp holding fixtures on ends of hoisting cables.
work_tasks.descr: Clamp holding fixtures on ends of hoisting cables.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Weigh clay, and mix with water and chemicals to make drilling mud, using portable mixers.
work_tasks.descr: Weigh clay, and mix with water and chemicals to make drilling mud, using portable mixers.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: String cables through pulleys and blocks.
work_tasks.descr: String cables through pulleys and blocks.

work_tasks.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_tasks.task: Steady pipes during connection to or disconnection from drill or casing strings.
work_tasks.descr: Steady pipes during connection to or disconnection from drill or casing strings.

work_behaviors.descr: Providing information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.element_name: Communicating with People Outside the Organization
work_behaviors.descr: Communicating with people outside the organization, representing the organization to customers, the public, government, and other external sources. This information can be exchanged in person, in writing, or by telephone or e-mail.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Developing constructive and cooperative working relationships with others, and maintaining them over time.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Providing personal assistance, medical attention, emotional support, or other personal care to others such as coworkers, customers, or patients.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Convincing others to buy merchandise/goods or to otherwise change their minds or actions.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.element_name: Resolving Conflicts and Negotiating with Others
work_behaviors.descr: Handling complaints, settling disputes, and resolving grievances and conflicts, or otherwise negotiating with others.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.element_name: Performing for or Working Directly with the Public
work_behaviors.descr: Performing for people or dealing directly with the public. This includes serving customers in restaurants and stores, and receiving clients or guests.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.element_name: Coordinating the Work and Activities of Others
work_behaviors.descr: Getting members of a group to work together to accomplish tasks.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Encouraging and building mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the educational needs of others, developing formal educational or training programs or classes, and teaching or instructing others.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Providing guidance and direction to subordinates, including setting performance standards and monitoring performance.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the developmental needs of others and coaching, mentoring, or otherwise helping others to improve their knowledge or skills.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.element_name: Providing Consultation and Advice to Others
work_behaviors.descr: Providing guidance and expert advice to management or other groups on technical, systems-, or process-related topics.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Performing day-to-day administrative tasks such as maintaining information files and processing paperwork.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Recruiting, interviewing, selecting, hiring, and promoting employees in an organization.

work_behaviors.title: Derrick Operators, Oil and Gas
work_behaviors.descr: Monitoring and controlling resources and overseeing the spending of money.
